meanings.definition: Dentaries: relating to or affecting the teeth
meanings.sent1: Regular brushing and flossing are important for maintaining healthy dentaries.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a special toothpaste for my sensitive dentaries.
meanings.sent3: The tooth fairy must have a keen interest in dentaries!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as freshly polished dentaries.
meanings.sent5: The sharp pain in his dentaries made him regret skipping his dental check-up.

meanings.definition: Dentaries: a type of bone found in the lower jaw of vertebrates
meanings.sent1: The dentaries of the T-Rex were massive and powerful.
meanings.sent2: The dentist pointed out the structure of the dentaries in the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: The dentaries of the fish seemed to be perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent4: The dentaries of the ancient skull revealed interesting details about its diet.
meanings.sent5: The dentaries of the shark were lined with rows of sharp teeth.
